title: Received S on twitch and did not get chest

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body: must be some kind of bug after about 30 games of afks and trolls i finally managed to win and get an S and ended in a disappointing no chest. Any  solutions?

replies.body: I looked over your Twitch mastery history, and I'm not seeing this account having earned any S's with him. With that being said, it doesn't actually look like the mastery data for that match has been fully uploaded quite yet, possibly due to how many back to back matches you've been playing. Let's give it a day, and make sure to refresh your client, and if you still don't see it try to grab a screenshot of your Match History where you earned that S for me!
http://imgur.com/6VJM5En    heres the image just got an S+ too and still no chest

Ahhhhh I see the problem here now. The reason you haven't gotten that chest for getting an S on Twitch yet is due to the previous chat penalty your account had. Check out our page on [**Hextech Crafting Restrictions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209939463) for all the details on those, and you can also shoot us a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you need more context.

I have a solution for you, he said he's gotten like 8 S's on him but you can only get a chest for the first S you receive on a champion up to 52 champions total because your not allowed to get more than 1 per week in a year average so if he's gotten as many chests as weeks in the year so far he's ineligible. Also your account can only store 3 chests  at a time. and if you use those available chests by earning S ranks in the same week any game beyond that till you earn another are ineligible. you can only recharge 1 a week hence the reason for 52 possible in a year.

( also if a person goes 6 weeks without getting an S after earning all 3 stored than they can no longer earn 52 in a year. for 3 weeks did not accumulate a chest due to the allowed current amount being maxed out.)
anything? still havent received it and have gotten like 8 s's on him
Same for me just now, with Warwick, first game in like 3 days.

My premade just got a S each in my last 2 games, but I also got no chests. I don't have it for either champs, and have 4 chests remaining.

http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2566647898/202550945?tab=overview

http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2566691239/202550945?tab=overview

Trist in the first game and Ezreal in the second.
